Entries.Marnie: #$c .5#Let's get you inside and warmed up.#Days like this make me grateful for indoor heating.#$e#You did get your animals heaters, yes?

Entries.movieTheater: I can't believe a movie theater came to our town! @, you want to come see a movie with me?$h
Entries.Resort_Chair_2: Oh, looking for a nice spot to rest my poor feet.
Entries.Resort_Bar_2: Mmmmm. Say, @, what looks good to you?
Entries.Resort_Pier: Look, @! Look how clear the water is!$h
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Our hoof trimmer is going to be stopping by in the next few days. Do you want me to see if he has time for you?
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: I've got so much work to do...$s
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Work on the ranch never ends...always have cows to milk, chicken coops to clean, inventory to manage...$s
Entries.17{{YearRemainder}}: Hey, @, I'm having our farrier come by soon. You got any work for him?$h
Entries.fall_15{{YearRemainder}}: Fall is Jas's favorite season. It's when the fairy roses bloom. She loves them.$h%revealtasteJas595

Entries.Resort_Bar: Ah, nothing like a nice relaxing day on the beach.$h
Entries.1_2: I try to keep my cows outdoors as much as possible. Keeping them in the pasture is so much better for them.
Entries.7_2: Animals will always prefer to eat fresh grass from outside, but they'll eat hay if they can't get grass.
Entries.9_2: Shane actually mucked out the cows' pen without me having to remind him yesterday.#$b#I hope that means he's feeling better?
Entries.11_2: The Saloon is the only real social activity we have in these parts. Maybe that's not a good thing.$s
Entries.13_2: Maybe I should get Shane season tickets? What's the gridball team he likes again? Was it the {{i18n:sports.team.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08|key=sports_team}} }}?
Entries.15_2: I've been working so hard during aerobics!$h#$b#It's not that farm work isn't hard work, but I enjoy a spot of exercise with friends too.
Entries.17_2: My weekends are Mondays and Tuesdays, mostly. You'll find me behind my counter most other days!
Entries.18_2: With the cost of feed going up like this, I'm not sure how I'll stay in business.$s
Cost of feed's going up, but I ain't getting paid any more for my eggs or milk.#$b#@, I think there's collusion going on.$s
